body:
Using the spack env features to install golang 1.13.5, the build process succeeds but fails to produce usable binaries...

```

```



### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack env activate x00
$ spack add go
$ spack install
...
==> Successfully installed go
  Fetch: 0.09s.  Build: 2m 47.32s.  Total: 2m 47.41s.
[+] /Users/jtang/develop/spack/opt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple/go-1.13.5-jpua2vslsez56idks3aupcwxn4zr3byn
==> Updating view at /Users/jtang/develop/spack/var/spack/environments/x00/.spack-env/view
⌂565% [jtang:~/develop … pt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple] develop+* 4m30s ± which go
/Users/jtang/develop/spack/var/spack/environments/x00/.spack-env/view/bin/go
⌂489% [jtang:~/develop … pt/spack/darwin-catalina-x86_64/clang-11.0.0-apple] develop+* ± go
dyld: Symbol not found: _iconv
  Referenced from: /usr/lib/libarchive.2.dylib
  Expected in: /Users/jtang/develop/spack/var/spack/environments/x00/.spack-env/view/lib/libiconv.2.dylib
 in /usr/lib/libarchive.2.dylib
Abort trap: 6
```
title: golang package fails to build a usable binary
